statements: SELECT * FROM TravelData;
SELECT id, travel_date, origin_location, destination_location FROM TravelData WHERE travel_distance > 100;
SELECT destination_location, travel_duration FROM TravelData WHERE travel_date = '2022-09-15' AND origin_location = 'City A';
SELECT * FROM TravelData WHERE passenger_count >= 5 ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT id, origin_location, travel_distance FROM TravelData WHERE destination_location LIKE '%Beach%' ORDER BY travel_distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM TravelData WHERE travel_distance > 500 ORDER BY travel_date DESC, travel_duration ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT origin_location, destination_location, SUM(passenger_count) as total_passengers FROM TravelData WHERE travel_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY origin_location, destination_location;

SELECT id, travel_date, origin_location, destination_location, travel_distance, travel_duration FROM TravelData WHERE passenger_count >= 2 AND travel_distance BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY travel_distance DESC, travel_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM TravelData WHERE origin_location LIKE '%York%' AND destination_location LIKE '%Beach%' ORDER BY travel_date ASC, travel_duration ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT AVG(travel_distance) as avg_distance, MIN(travel_duration) as min_duration, MAX(travel_duration) as max_duration FROM TravelData GROUP BY origin_location, destination_location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_distance DESC, max_duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM travel_data WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT id, date, revenue FROM travel_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT id, location, revenue FROM travel_data WHERE revenue > 1000 AND location = 'London';
SELECT * FROM travel_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT location, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM travel_data GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM travel_data WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, revenue FROM travel_data WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM travel_trends WHERE trend_score > 8 ORDER BY trend_score ASC
SELECT id, location, revenue FROM travel_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM travel_data JOIN travel_trends ON travel_data.id = travel_trends.trend_id WHERE travel_data.location = 'Paris' AND trend_score > 7
SELECT * FROM historical_travel_data;
SELECT id, source_location, destination_location FROM historical_travel_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT destination_location, distance FROM historical_travel_data WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT id, date, source_location, destination_location, travel_duration FROM historical_travel_data WHERE source_location = 'New York';
SELECT id, date, source_location, destination_location, travel_duration FROM historical_travel_data WHERE travel_duration < 5 ORDER BY travel_duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_travel_data ORDER BY date DESC, travel_duration ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, source_location, destination_location, distance FROM historical_travel_data WHERE distance > 500 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT id, date, source_location, destination_location, travel_duration FROM historical_travel_data WHERE source_location = 'New York' OR destination_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT id, date, source_location, destination_location, distance, travel_duration FROM historical_travel_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT prediction_date, source_location, destination_location, predicted_demand, optimization_strategy FROM travel_predictions ORDER BY prediction_date DESC, predicted_demand ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_trips;
SELECT trip_id, trip_date, destination_city FROM historical_trips WHERE trip_distance > 100;
SELECT customer_id, trip_date, destination_city, trip_distance FROM historical_trips WHERE trip_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM travel_trends;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM business_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE 'Marketing%';
SELECT * FROM historical_trips ORDER BY trip_date DESC, trip_distance ASC
SELECT customer_id, destination_city FROM historical_trips WHERE trip_distance > 500 ORDER BY destination_city
SELECT trip_date, destination_city, trip_distance FROM historical_trips WHERE trip_distance > 1000 AND trip_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM travel_trends WHERE trend_name LIKE '%analytics%' OR trend_description LIKE '%data%'
SELECT * FROM future_demand WHERE predicted_demand < 1000
SELECT * FROM TravelData ORDER BY travel_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT traveler_name, origin_city, destination_city FROM TravelData WHERE origin_city = 'New York' AND destination_city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT trend_date, trend_description FROM TravelTrends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FutureDemand ORDER BY demand_prediction DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM BusinessStrategies;
SELECT * FROM TravelData WHERE origin_city = 'New York' ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, origin_city, destination_city FROM TravelData WHERE traveler_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM TravelTrends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT id, pattern_details FROM TravelPatterns WHERE pattern_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM BusinessStrategies ORDER BY strategy_name ASC LIMIT 3;
